greeting: Hello! Welcome to QualtSpire. I'm here to help you upgrade your skills. What course are you looking for today?
goodbye: Goodbye! Keep learning and growing. Visit us again at QualtSpire!
thanks: You're very welcome! Let me know if you need anything else.
smalltalk_how_are_you: I'm doing great and ready to help you find the perfect course! How are you?
about_qualtspire: QualtSpire is an ed-tech platform dedicated to providing practical, hands-on training in tech skills like Web Development, UI/UX, and Excel. We focus on real-world projects, not just theory.
about_mission: Our mission is to empower students and professionals with affordable, high-quality technical education that leads to real career opportunities.
about_instructors: Our courses are taught by industry experts who have real-world experience in Full Stack Development, Design, and Data Analysis.
contact_info: You can reach us via email at qualtspire@hotmail.com or call us at +91 8318926430.
contact_phone: Our support number is +91 8318926430. We are available during business hours.
contact_email: Please send your queries to qualtspire@hotmail.com. We usually respond within 24 hours.
contact_address: Our office is located at: Bharti puram colony, Sarkari tube bell near Choudhri niwas, Tiwari ganj, Lucknow 226028.
contact_hours: Our support team is available Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM IST.
social_youtube: Yes! Check out our free tutorials on our YouTube channel. (Link available on our homepage)
social_instagram: Follow us on Instagram for daily tips and updates! (Link on homepage)
social_github: You can check our open-source projects and code repositories on GitHub.
courses_offered: We offer a variety of courses including 'Zero to Full Stack Hero', 'Master English in 30 Days', 'Excel Basic to Advance', and 'UI/UX Design'.
course_levels: We have courses for all levels! Our 'Zero to Full Stack Hero' is perfect for beginners, while we also have advanced modules for experienced pros.
course_practical_focus: Absolutely. QualtSpire focuses on 'Learning by Doing'. You will build real-world projects like e-commerce sites and dashboards.
enrollment_process: To enroll, simply go to our Courses page, select the course you like, and click 'Buy Now'. You'll get instant access after payment.
course_english_overview: The 'Master English in 30 Days' course is designed to improve your fluency and confidence in professional communication.
course_english_price: The English Speaking course is affordably priced. Please check the course page for the latest discount!
course_english_duration: This is a 30-day intensive program designed to boost your skills quickly.
course_english_syllabus: You will learn grammar basics, professional email writing, public speaking confidence, and interview skills.
course_fullstack_hero_overview: Our 'Zero to Full Stack Hero' bootcamp takes you from writing your first line of code to building complete web applications.
course_fullstack_hero_price: This is our premium bootcamp. Visit the course page to see the current pricing and installment options.
course_fullstack_hero_syllabus: The syllabus covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
course_fullstack_hero_prerequisites: No prior coding experience is required! We start from the absolute basics.
course_fullstack_hero_projects: You will build 5+ major projects, including a clone of Netflix and a fully functional e-commerce store.
course_webdev_qualtspire_overview: The 'QualtSpire Full Stack Web Development' course is a comprehensive path for those wanting to master the MERN stack.
course_webdev_qualtspire_duration: The course spans approximately 12 weeks of self-paced learning with weekly live doubt sessions.
course_webdev_qualtspire_cert: Yes, you will receive a verified Certificate of Completion from QualtSpire upon finishing the course.
course_excel_overview: Our 'Excel Basic to Advance' course turns you into a spreadsheet wizard, teaching you everything from sums to complex macros.
course_excel_price: The Excel course is priced very competitively. Check the website for the latest deal!
course_excel_syllabus: Topics include VLOOKUP, Pivot Tables, Data Visualization, Macros, and VBA scripting.
course_excel_career: Excel skills are in high demand for Data Analyst, Accountant, and Administrative roles.
course_uiux_overview: The UI/UX course teaches you how to design beautiful, user-friendly mobile and web interfaces.
course_uiux_tools: You will master industry-standard tools like Figma and Adobe XD.
course_uiux_syllabus: We cover Design Theory, Wireframing, Prototyping, and User Testing.
course_uiux_portfolio: Yes! By the end of the course, you will have a professional design portfolio to show potential employers.
faq_refunds: We have a student-friendly refund policy. If you are not satisfied within the first 7 days, let us know for a full refund.
faq_lifetime_access: Yes! Once you buy a course, you get lifetime access to the videos and future updates.
faq_certification: All our paid courses come with a certificate that you can add to your LinkedIn profile.
faq_mobile_access: Yes, our platform is mobile-friendly so you can learn on the go.
faq_payment_methods: We accept UPI, Credit/Debit Cards, and Net Banking.
career_opportunities: Our courses are designed to get you job-ready. We provide resume reviews and mock interviews for our bootcamp students.
career_support: We have a dedicated career support team that helps you find internships and junior developer roles.
tech_issue_login: If you can't log in, please click 'Forgot Password' or email us at qualtspire@hotmail.com.
tech_issue_video: If videos aren't playing, please check your internet connection or try clearing your browser cache.
testimonials_general: Our students love us! 'Gene Bates' from Cambridge University called our courses 'comprehensive', and 'Laura Mckenzie' loved the practical focus.
testimonials_success_stories: Many of our students have secured jobs at companies like Quarter Ltd. and freelance projects globally.
skill_recommendation_beginner: For complete beginners, we recommend 'Zero to Full Stack Hero' or 'Excel Basic to Advance'.
skill_recommendation_creative: If you are creative and like design, 'UI/UX Design' is the perfect course for you.
skill_recommendation_job: The 'Full Stack Web Development' course has the highest hiring potential in the current market.
discount_codes: We often run seasonal sales. Subscribe to our newsletter to get the latest coupon codes.
community_access: Yes, all students get access to our exclusive Discord community to ask questions and network.
instructor_mentorship: Our premium courses include weekly mentorship calls where you can ask doubts directly to the instructor.
language_of_instruction: Our courses are primarily taught in English, with simple explanations suitable for everyone.
certificate_validity: Our certificates are valid for a lifetime and are recognized by many startups and tech companies.
project_reviews: Yes, your capstone projects will be reviewed by our mentors to ensure code quality.
learning_path_frontend: To become a Frontend Developer, focus on our HTML, CSS, React, and UI/UX modules.
learning_path_backend: For Backend roles, dive deep into our Node.js, Express, and Database modules.
learning_path_fullstack: The Full Stack path combines both frontend and backend. It's our most comprehensive track.
